segments.text: Pretty good . Mary , I was wondering if you would like to come to a party on Friday night ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am free that night , and a party sounds good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine . It will be at my house . Do you know how to get there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I kind of know where you live , but could you e-mail me your address ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can do that . Do you have anyone that you would like to bring with you to the party ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would really like to bring my friend Jake , if that would be OK .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh yeah , I remember Jake . That would be fine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like some help with the food ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just bring along whatever it is that you and Jake would like to drink .
segments.speaker: S2
